unnormalised: ## Adaptive Learning: The Future of Education in India?
normalised: ## Adaptive Learning: The Future of Education in India?

unnormalised: Adaptive learning, at its core, aims to personalize the learning experience for each student. Instead of a one-size-fits-all approach, the system adapts the difficulty and content based on the student's performance in real-time. Think of it like this: If Priya is struggling with trigonometry, the system will offer her simpler problems and foundational concepts until she grasps them. Meanwhile, Rohan, who's acing the topic, will be presented with more challenging problems and advanced applications.
